TextLibrary.Text: Elistara
The Mages have cast their spells and looked deep into Bane's realm.
The Mages have cast their spells and looked deep into Bane's realm.
The Mages have cast their spells and looked deep into Bane's realm.
The Mages have cast their spells and looked deep into Bane's realm.
What did they find? Is he planning another attack?
What did they find? Is he planning another attack?
What did they find? Is he planning another attack?
What did they find? Is he planning another attack?
There is a huge force of Undead massing in the plains led by three Necromancers, the Generals of Lord Bane's army.
There is a huge force of Undead massing in the plains led by three Necromancers, the Generals of Lord Bane's army.
There is a huge force of Undead massing in the plains led by three Necromancers, the Generals of Lord Bane's army.
There is a huge force of Undead massing in the plains led by three Necromancers, the Generals of Lord Bane's army.
Will Skullguard Keep stand against them?
Will Skullguard Keep stand against them?
Will Skullguard Keep stand against them?
Will Skullguard Keep stand against them?
This force is ten times the size of the last, and we have but half the defenders we had before. Skullguard will fall.
This force is ten times the size of the last, and we have but half the defenders we had before. Skullguard will fall.
This force is ten times the size of the last, and we have but half the defenders we had before. Skullguard will fall.
This force is ten times the size of the last, and we have but half the defenders we had before. Skullguard will fall.
Then we need another plan. What if we strike at his Generals, the Necromancers?
Then we need another plan. What if we strike at his Generals, the Necromancers?
Then we need another plan. What if we strike at his Generals, the Necromancers?
Then we need another plan. What if we strike at his Generals, the Necromancers?
They will simply rise again as Arkliches. At best it would delay the inevitable.
They will simply rise again as Arkliches. At best it would delay the inevitable.
They will simply rise again as Arkliches. At best it would delay the inevitable.
They will simply rise again as Arkliches. At best it would delay the inevitable.
Then we need to buy some time and strike at Lord Bane himself.
Then we need to buy some time and strike at Lord Bane himself.
Then we need to buy some time and strike at Lord Bane himself.
Then we need to buy some time and strike at Lord Bane himself.
But Lord Bane is a God! How can he be defeated?
But Lord Bane is a God! How can he be defeated?
But Lord Bane is a God! How can he be defeated?
But Lord Bane is a God! How can he be defeated?
If my time in the Realms of War piecing Lord Sartek back together taught me anything, it's that even Gods have weaknesses.
If my time in the Realms of War piecing Lord Sartek back together taught me anything, it's that even Gods have weaknesses.
If my time in the Realms of War piecing Lord Sartek back together taught me anything, it's that even Gods have weaknesses.
If my time in the Realms of War piecing Lord Sartek back together taught me anything, it's that even Gods have weaknesses.
We'll start by striking at these Necromancers. After that, we'll see how strong Bane's defenses really are.

Elistara
Os Magos lançaram seus feitiços e olharam profundamente no reino de Bane.
Os Magos lançaram seus feitiços e olharam profundamente no reino de Bane.
Os Magos lançaram seus feitiços e olharam profundamente no reino de Bane.
Os Magos lançaram seus feitiços e olharam profundamente no reino de Bane.
O que eles encontraram? Ele está planejando outro ataque?
O que eles encontraram? Ele está planejando outro ataque?
O que eles encontraram? Ele está planejando outro ataque?
O que eles encontraram? Ele está planejando outro ataque?
Há uma enorme força de mortos-vivos se concentrando nas planícies liderada por três necromantes, os generais do exército de Lord Bane.
Há uma enorme força de mortos-vivos se concentrando nas planícies liderada por três necromantes, os generais do exército de Lord Bane.
Há uma enorme força de mortos-vivos se concentrando nas planícies liderada por três necromantes, os generais do exército de Lord Bane.
Há uma enorme força de mortos-vivos se concentrando nas planícies liderada por três Necromantes, os generais do exército de Lord Bane.
A Fortaleza Skullguard resistirá contra eles?
A Fortaleza Skullguard resistirá contra eles?
A Fortaleza Skullguard resistirá contra eles?
A Fortaleza Skullguard resistirá contra eles?
Esta força é dez vezes maior que a última, e temos apenas metade dos defensores que tínhamos antes. Skullguard cairá.
Esta força é dez vezes maior que a última, e temos apenas metade dos defensores que tínhamos antes. Skullguard cairá.

Então precisamos de outro plano. E se atacarmos seus generais, os Necromantes?

Então precisamos ganhar algum tempo e atacar o próprio Lorde Bane.

Mas Lorde Bane é um Deus! Como ele pode ser derrotado?
Mas Lord Bane é um Deus! Como ele pode ser derrotado?
